# Simple Tagger Editor

**Edit tagger from auto generated caption one by one**

2024/2/25 by DKZ

![simple-tagger-editor](https://github.com/davidkingzyb/SimpleTaggerEditor/assets/6694635/4f6f14a9-b00c-4508-bdd6-497015c15f23)

### How to use

1.input folder path  
2.click load  
3.select image  
4.edit tagger  
5.save
